channel.title: Walkaround on client crashing on x86-64 (Vista/windows7/64 bit OS)
channel.description:
This is a malformed walkaround for the people who are having problems with this.
Most run batch files are simular to this: [code] Quote: @echo off Start java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit [/code]
The walkaround is basicly simple, just replace Start Java with the directory to your java executable.
[code] @echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit pause [/code]
I'll have a look at how to do this on a macintosh.

item.title: Walkaround on client crashing on x86-64 (Vista/windows7/64 bit OS)
item.dc:creator: @Crossibow Crossibow
item.description:
@Crossibow wrote:

OMFG IT WORKED!!! YAY!!! now to realize how i can run the server… :l

Read full topic

item.title: Walkaround on client crashing on x86-64 (Vista/windows7/64 bit OS)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

the wanderer:

When I click run.bat it says Cannot find -Xmx500m. Please make sure you typed it in correctly. I found javaw.exe and put " " around it. Not a complete retard here. Just wondering how I would fix this.

The xmx is just reserving the said amount of RAM for that program. I wouldn’t worry about it, as long as its not a memory hog, it should run fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Walkaround on client crashing on x86-64 (Vista/windows7/64 bit OS)
item.dc:creator: @jobo jobo
item.description:
@jobo wrote:

How do i fix this one?
my computer is a Acer Aspire Predator.
runs on Windows 7.
And is a 64Bit.
Its a 317 client btw.

@echo off
title intdub317
:main
cd Files
start JavaW -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

Read full topic

item.title: Walkaround on client crashing on x86-64 (Vista/windows7/64 bit OS)
item.dc:creator: @Sexy-Vampire Sexy-Vampire
item.description:
@Sexy-Vampire wrote:

ive done this now client wont work is there a differnt way ?

edit nvm looked at my other server and i come up with this

@echo off title Exion Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause

title can be your server enjoy

Read full topic
